marklogic.body:
"Please don't think you know the situation because it's unlike anything I'm sure you've ever seen."
What part of "yeah, I have" was so hard to understand? Â I specifically said that I've dealt with the same thing too. Â Stop Acting like your problems are unique. Â I know how much it hurts to learn that your parents aren't perfect when you think that this sort of thing would never happen to you. Â I know just how damaging dysfunctional families can be. Â Yes, what your mother (and OP's mother, and my father) did was awful and wrong, but it's not worth Burning your bridges. Â Your mother lost her husband. Â Isn't that enough punishment?
